segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, and the water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a widening puddle, and no one seems to notice or care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is being wasted and the potential damage it's causing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing and why no one has turned off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is streaming down the cabinet doors, and it's only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel frustrated at the lack of awareness and action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is almost infuriating, seeing such a simple problem being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon before it gets worse and causes more damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is a mess, both literally and figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR
